title: No border even though im silver?
body: Im currently silver 5 and I never got my border. Ive been silver months ago and I do not have any restrictions on my account while my other account gets the icon and border. What is up with that?

replies.body: It will take time for it to show up. I think everyone will get their border by 19th of November, just wait for a few more days, I haven't got mine too (border, vic skin etc). It's only a problem If it doesn't show up after that date.

The [**Ranked Rewards Help Desk **](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk)mentions that those rewards are still being delivered over the course of Nov, so no worries yet. If you still don't see anything in about a week or so be sure to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
